name: Void (itch) (Chaxs)
description:
In this 3D jump and run game you play the little demon Void who wants to escape from hell.  Their goal is to get to the upper world to become a cat and live a happy life.




Controls: Features:

Full controller support

Open Dyslexic

Color deficiency mode

Adjustable mouse sensitivity

Install

1: Download

2: Extract

3: Start game

4: Escape Hell

Credits:

This game is a third semester project for the htk academy. 

Made in Unreal 5 

Assets in Blender

Sounds:

Epidemic Sound

We love Indies

SunKnut 

Assets:

Disclaimer: This game may cause vertigo and motion sickness.
